languages.text: Подготовьтесь к бою. Расставьте персонажей на позиции.
Prepare for battle. Get your characters into position.
languages.original_text: Подготовьтесь к бою. Расставьте персонажей на позиции.

traits.locale_text: Prepare for battle. Get your characters into position.
Prepare for battle. Get your characters into position.
Prepare for battle. Get your characters into position.

languages.text: Prepárate para luchar. Posiciona a tus personajes.
languages.original_text: Prepare for battle. Get your characters into position.

traits.locale_text: Prepárate para luchar. Posiciona a tus personajes.

languages.text: 戦闘準備をしてください。キャラを配置しましょう。
languages.original_text: Prepare for battle. Get your characters into position.

traits.locale_text: 戦闘準備をしてください。キャラを配置しましょう。

languages.text: 准备战斗。将角色部署至这个位置。
languages.original_text: Prepare for battle. Get your characters into position.

traits.locale_text: 准备战斗。将角色部署至这个位置。

languages.text: Bereite dich auf die Schlacht vor. Bringe deine Charaktere in Position.
languages.original_text: Prepare for battle. Get your characters into position.

traits.locale_text: Bereite dich auf die Schlacht vor. Bringe deine Charaktere in Position.

languages.text: Préparez-vous au combat. Mettez vos personnages en position.
languages.original_text: Prepare for battle. Get your characters into position.

traits.locale_text: Préparez-vous au combat. Mettez vos personnages en position.
